title: Narnia (2005) Extended Edition PAL DVD9
description:
The Chronicles of Narnia: The Lion, the Witch and the Wardrobe (2005) Extended Edition
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
"Some journeys take us far from home. Some adventures lead us to our destiny."

IMDB: <a href="
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0363771/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0363771/</a>

Audio: English (DD5.1), Danish (DD5.1), Norwegian (DD5.1)

Subs: Danish, Norwegian, English

Extra Materials:
- Disc 1 (EXTENDED SPECIAL EDITION OF THE MOVIE):
  - Funny Bloopers.
  - Fun Facts about Narnia:
    - Watch the movie along with facts about C.S. Lewis, the animals and Narnia.
  - Commentary with the Children and Director.
  - Commentary with Production Team.
- Disc 2 (THE WORLDS OF NARNIA):
  - Director's Diary.
  - The Childrens Magical Journey:
    - William, Anna, Skandar and Georgie tells about their experiences during the production.
  - Creating an Epic Story:
    - From C.S. Lewis' imagination: To tell with image and sound.
    - How the Animals and Creatures were made.
    - A Moviesequence in Details: The ice is cracking.
    - Creatures, Animals, Landscape and Legends.
  - The Creatures of Narnia.
  - Explore the Landscape of Narnia.
  - And lots more...
- Disc 3 (C.S. LEWIS - DREAMER OF NARNIA):
  - Exclusive World-Premiere:
    - A never-before shown movie about about the man who created the magical land of Narnia.
- Disc 4 (VISUALISING THE LION, THE WITCH AND THE WARDROBE - THE COMPLETE PRODUCTION EXPERIENCE):
  - Production:
    - In-depth commentary about the work and techniques that were used to make the book into an award-winning movie.
    - Bonus Materials.
  - Behind the Scenes at "The Great Battle".
  - Narnia Gallery.


Plot outline:
Based on the classic novel by 'CS Lewis' . Four London children are sent to a professor's country home in order for protection during World War II. There they find a magic wardrobe which leads to a mystical land called Narnia, which is being ruled by an evil witch. To defeat the witch, they must join forces with Aslan, the lion God of Narnia.
